rescuecore2.standard.kernel.comms

Interface Channel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractChannel, RadioChannel, VoiceChannel

    public interface Channel
    Interface for Channels used by the ChannelCommunicationModel.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSubscriber(Entity e)
      Add a subscriber to this channel.
      java.util.Collection<AKSpeak> getMessagesForAgent(Entity agent)
      Get the messages that should be send to an agent.

      Get all subscribers.
      void push(AKSpeak message)
      Push a message through this channel.
      void removeSubscriber(Entity e)
      Remove a subscriber from this channel.
      void setInputNoise(Noise noise)
      Set the input noise object for this channel.
      void setOutputNoise(Noise noise)
      Set the output noise object for this channel.
      void timestep()
      Notify the channel that a timestep has elapsed.

      • timestep

        void timestep()
        Notify the channel that a timestep has elapsed.

        Add a subscriber to this channel.

      • getSubscribers

        java.util.Collection<Entity> getSubscribers()
        Get all subscribers.
        Returns:
        All subscribers.

      • push

        void push(AKSpeak message)
          throws InvalidMessageException
        Push a message through this channel.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to push.
        Throws:
        InvalidMessageException - If the message is invalid.

      • getMessagesForAgent

        java.util.Collection<AKSpeak> getMessagesForAgent(Entity agent)
        Get the messages that should be send to an agent.
        Parameters:
        agent - The agent to look up.
        Returns:
        All messages for that agent.

      • setInputNoise

        void setInputNoise(Noise noise)
        Set the input noise object for this channel. Input noise is applied to the message once on arrival.
        Parameters:
        noise - The input noise.

      • setOutputNoise

        void setOutputNoise(Noise noise)
        Set the output noise object for this channel. Output noise is applied to the message once for each listener as it is sent.
        Parameters:
        noise - The output noise.
